groups.thesis: Sector under pressure with avg YTD return of -6.3%. Narrow leadership — only 2/5 stocks beating S&P 500. 60% above 50-day MA, trend intact but mixed. Healthy momentum (avg RSI 54).
groups.thesis_breaker: S&P 500 correction below 6302 (10% off 7002 high). Momentum breakdown if avg RSI drops below 40 (currently 54). Trend weakening — 2/5 (40%) already below 50-day MA, critical if >50%. Group leadership fragile (avg YTD -6.3%), at risk of turning negative.
